mapper.insert: insert into member(id,department,position, emplno, password, startdate, addr, phone, email, name, birth) values(#{id},#{department}, #{position}, #{emplno}, #{password},#{startdate}, #{addr}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{name},#{birth})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id};
select * from member where id=#{id} and password=#{password};
select id from member where name=#{name} and emplno=#{emplno};
select count(*) from member where email=#{email} and id=#{id};
mapper.update: update member set password=#{password} where email=#{email} and id=#{id};
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where emplno like CONCAT(#{emplno},'%');
